Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Two Dances, D 980A

?

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 1'

  • 1. A major
  • 2. E major

These dances are incomplete. In the Deutsch catalogue, the dances were originally numbered D 640 before being re-numbered to D 980A.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/6 · BA 5529 · Tänze I · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50022 · Sämtliche Tänze für Klavier / Band 2 · ed. Alexander Weinmann

1. A major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1

2. E major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1
